name: Death Race 16
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Simon Leck - Atlantis Software Ltd. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

You have 80 seconds in Level 1 to overtake 30 cars. Drive at speed of up to 300 mph, trying to avoid the other cars as they swerve across your path. If you manage to overtake 30 cars without losing 3 lives, next level is coming up +10 seconds bonus time. The game features many different screens, day and night driving and a high score record. But the calculation is tricky, because not every car counts and not every car gets points in the final settlement.


Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor LEFT/RIGHT
Accelerate: Cursor UP
Brake: Cursor DOWN


Start the game: Enter
Move: Cursor LEFT/RIGHT
Accelerate: Cursor UP
Brake: Cursor DOWN

https://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Death_Race_16
